title: Fettuccine with brandied prawns
ingredients: ['450g fettuccine pasta', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '450g prawns, peeled and deveined', '6 spring onions, thinly sliced', '4 cloves garlic, thinly sliced', '60ml brandy', '2 large tomatoes, diced', '125ml dry white wine', '110g butter', '15g chopped fresh basil', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '40g grated Parmesan cheese']
